contest-event.event-date:
May 5, 1985 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Civic Hall, Holmfirth Prizes - 1st £65 and cup, 2nd £35 and cup, 3rd £25, 4th £15. March contest - 1st (£10 and cup) Boarshurst 'B', 2nd (£5) Hepworth. Hymn tune - 1st(£10 and cup) Boarshurst B, 2nd (£5) Hade Edge. 6 bands competed.
April 4, 2012, 8:38 p.m. June 27, 2016, 3:51 p.m.
1 Lindley Band Neil Jowett Journey into Freedom
2 Hepworth Band Alan Jenkins The Plantagenets
3 Boarshurst 'B' Eric Landon Triumphant Rhapsody
4 Hade Edge Phil Garlick Essay [Gregson]
Unknown Result Skelmanthorpe Band Lawrence Mann Entertainments
Unknown Result Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band David Hirst Music for a Brass Band
Withdrawn Boarshurst Silver Band Dave Morris
Withdrawn Slaithwaite Band Tony Whitaker
